meanings.definition: Measures taken to defend against biological threats.
meanings.sent1: Our country invests in biodefenses to protect us from harmful viruses.
meanings.sent2: The military has specialized units trained in biodefenses to respond to biological attacks.
meanings.sent3: The scientists' dedication to improving biodefenses led to a breakthrough in vaccine development.
meanings.sent4: Her immune system acted like strong biodefenses, swiftly defeating the flu virus.
meanings.sent5: The fortress of biodefenses shielded the city from the spread of the deadly disease.

meanings.definition: The ability to resist or fight off biological attacks.
meanings.sent1: His strong biodefenses helped him recover quickly from the flu.
meanings.sent2: The body's natural biodefenses work tirelessly to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's superpower was having unbeatable biodefenses against any illness.
meanings.sent4: The ancient tribe's knowledge of herbal remedies acted as powerful biodefenses.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut's suit provided essential biodefenses in the harsh environment of space.
